price: (38) And [We destroyed] ʿAad and Thamūd and the companions of the well[1025] and many generations between them.
arabic: وَعَادٗا وَثَمُودَاْ وَأَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلرَّسِّ وَقُرُونَۢا بَيۡنَ ذَٰلِكَ كَثِيرٗا
footnotes: [1025]- Said to be a people who denied Prophet Shuʿayb or possibly those mentioned in Sūrah Yā Seen, 36:13-29.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International

meta.transliteration: waʿādan wathamūdā wa-aṣḥāba al-rasi waqurūnan bayna dhālika kathīran
